template: Please summarise the research paper titled '{paper}' with the following specifications: Explanation Style: {style}Explanation Length: {length_input}1. Mathematical Details:-Include relevant mathematical equations if present in the paper-Explain the mathematical concepts clearly2.Analogies: Use relatable analogies to explain complex mathematical conceptsIf certain information is not avaiable in the paper then respond with 'Information Not Available instead of guessing.
